review_text_worker: This was an easy host to work for. Looking forward to do repeat jobs if possible.
Fairly easy job, but instructions not fully clear.
Was a bit rude and disrespectful. But provided equipment and left me alone after a while.
review_text_employer: Provided an incomplete cleaning job. Insisted on listening to his 1990s Walk-Man and doing Fortnite dances every few minutes. Started vaping in our house, which we repeatedly asked that he stop. He then told us 'OK, Boomer' over and over again, as though he thought made him 'win' the argument. Anyways, we tipped him well and hope he never has anything to do with our home ever again.
